data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: I fell asleep with the price of petrol on my mind. Why? When I don't even drive a car? I went to work as usual on the bus but I could not get the question " Which is best for the environment petrol or diesel? Out of my mind" As we passed the Petrol station I saw that the pump was surrounded by protestors. I wondered if I should join them?.
data.original_output: I fell asleep with the price of petrol on my mind. Why? When I don't even drive a car? I went to work as usual on the bus but I could not get the question " Which is best for the environment petrol or diesel? out of my mind" As we passed the Petrol station I saw that the pump was surrounded by protestors.  I wondered if I should  join them?.

data.boring_theme: putting a stamp on the envelop containing a letter to send it
data.output: "Stamp your name up in the stars!" Was it an old song a friend of mine used to sing? I tried to remember his name, but it was gone in the mist of time. My memory was getting worse, then I remembered the last letter he sent me. Did I send a reply?
data.original_output: "Stamp your name up in the stars!" Was it an old song a friend of mine used to sing? I tried to remember his name, but it was gone in the mist of time. My memory was getting worse, then I remembered the last letter he sent me. Did I send a reply?

data.boring_theme: having an organ empire and complying with regulations
data.output: The mighty Roman empire we learned about in school. I knew that I needed to write an essay on it to comply with my qualification requirements, but I didn't really want to. Surely somewhere in my brain I could find a way of wriggling out of it. After all they keep telling us what a wonderful organ our brain is.
data.original_output: The mighty Roman empire we learned about in school. I knew that I needed to write an essay on it to comply with my qualification requirements, but I didn't really want to. Surely somewhere in my brain I could find a way of wriggling out of it. After all they keep telling us what a wonderful organ our brain is.

data.boring_theme: the feeling of gloom you have about an existing payment
data.output: I exist to enjoy myself not for mundane tasks. I go outside to enjoy the sea view and breathe in the air. I could never live in an environment that was filled with gloom. I would travel, experience life, meet interesting people and entice someone else to make the necessary payment.
data.original_output: I exist to enjoy myself not for mundane tasks. I go outside to enjoy the sea view and breathe in the air. I could never live in an environment that was filled with gloom. I would travel, experience life, meet interesting people and entice someone else to make the necessary payment.
